intro: Gliding joints allow bones to slide over each other.
notes: The Carpals are 8 small bones in the wrist.
They slide to allow movement in many directions.
Also found in the ankle (Tarsals) and between vertebrae.

hotspots.label: Radius
hotspots.info: Forearm bone on the thumb side.

hotspots.label: Ulna
hotspots.info: Forearm bone on the pinky side.

hotspots.label: Carpals
hotspots.info: 8 bones that glide over each other.
